action.des: Pitcher Change: Blake Hawksworth replaces Kyle Lohse, batting 8th.

pitch.cc: Blake Hawksworth is trying to tie up Ramon Hernandez with fastballs inside, where Ramon Hernandez hits .600.
Blake Hawksworth had Ramon Hernandez down 0-2 but could not put him away.

atbat.des: Drew Stubbs called out on strikes.
Brandon Phillips singles on a sharp ground ball to center fielder Colby Rasmus. Ramon Hernandez to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Blake Hawksworth went back to the sinker even though Brandon Phillips hit for a single last time up.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Dennys Reyes replaces Blake Hawksworth, batting 8th.

atbat.des: Joey Votto singles on a line drive to center fielder Colby Rasmus. Ramon Hernandez scores. Brandon Phillips to 3rd.

pitch.cc: Dennys Reyes is trying to tie up Joey Votto with fastballs inside, where Joey Votto hits .286.

atbat.des: Scott Rolen out on a sacrifice fly to center fielder Colby Rasmus. Brandon Phillips scores. Joey Votto to 2nd.

pitch.cc: Jay Bruce may sit on the four-seam fastball here, since Dennys Reyes would rather go after him than on-deck hitter Drew Stubbs.
Dennys Reyes is having trouble locating his sinker.

action.des: Pitcher Change: Ryan Franklin replaces Dennys Reyes, batting 5th.

pitch.cc: Ryan Franklin is getting a generous strike zone this inning from home plate ump Paul Emmel.

atbat.des: Joe Mather grounds out, shortstop Orlando Cabrera to first baseman Joey Votto. Jaime Garcia to 3rd.
